bill.title: Relating To Child Care.
bill.description: Requires the department of accounting and general services to establish and operate a child care center pilot program for eligible children of state employees, one in or near the state capitol and one in Kapolei. Appropriates funds. Repeals on 6/30/2028. Effective 6/30/3000. (HD1)

history.action: Referred to LGO, HUS, FIN, referral sheet 3
Bill scheduled to be heard by LGO on Tuesday, 02-07-23 9:00AM in House conference room 309 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.

The committee on LGO recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Matayoshi, Garrett, Kapela, Martinez, Sayama, Tam, Alcos; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from LGO (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 197) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to HUS.
Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on HUS with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Pierick voting no (1) and none excused (0).
Bill scheduled to be heard by HUS on Tuesday, 02-14-23 9:30AM in House conference room 329 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.

The committee on HUS recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Mizuno, Amato, Belatti, Ilagan, Kobayashi, Takenouchi, Nishimoto; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Garcia.
Reported from HUS (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 575), recommending referral to FIN.
Report adopted; referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Todd excused (1).

subjects.subject_name: Child Care Centers for Eligible Children of State Employees
